title: Change FQDN
content:
You may need to change the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of your system in some scenarios. Here are some examples:

  • Your organization is rebranding its business
  • You need to change the FQDN of the suite before go-live
  • You're pushing a standby environment to production after a disaster recovery

Follow the links below to change the FQDN for the components in your system as needed. 

  • Change FQDN for OMT and the suite
  • Change OO FQDN
  • Change UD/UCMDB FQDN
  • Change Audit FQDN (managed Kubernetes) and Change Audit FQDN (embedded Kubernetes)
